title: Adopt copier template in surfmon
description: Apply the copier-uv-bleeding template to surfmon to standardize project structure, CI/CD, and tooling configuration.

title: Fix potential division by zero in format_diff
description: compare.py:31 only checks old > 0, but old could be negative. Should check old != 0 to avoid division by zero.
close_reason: Fixed - check old != 0 instead of old > 0

title: Add surfmon to homebrew tap
description: Create a Homebrew formula for surfmon in ichoosetoaccept/homebrew-tap. Requires creating a GitHub release with tarball, then adding Formula/surfmon.rb to the tap repo.

title: Reset stop_monitoring flag between watch runs
description: cli.py:27 global stop_monitoring flag is set to True on Ctrl+C but never reset. If CLI used as library or in long-running process, subsequent watch calls exit immediately.
close_reason: Fixed - reset stop_monitoring at start of watch

title: Fix race condition in process filtering
description: monitor.py:111-113 calls p.name() without exception handling when filtering crashpad processes. Process could terminate between being added to list and filter, causing psutil.NoSuchProcess.

title: Remove unused sys import
description: cli.py:4 imports sys at module level but never uses it. Also unused import inside cleanup function at line 414.

title: Avoid mutating input in find_language_servers
description: monitor.py find_language_servers() mutates server.cmdline in place on the input list. Consider returning new ProcessInfo objects with modified cmdline instead of mutating the originals, for cleaner functional style.
close_reason: Refactored to use dataclasses.replace instead of mutating input

title: Fix hardcoded paths in verbose output
description: output.py:227-232 shows hardcoded .windsurf and .codeium/windsurf paths instead of using get_paths() from config. When monitoring Windsurf Next, displays incorrect paths.

title: Comprehensively audit and modernize copier-uv-bleeding
description: Review and update the copier-uv-bleeding template to ensure it follows current best practices for Python project setup with uv, modern tooling, and CI/CD patterns.

title: Replace subprocess ps aux with psutil in check_orphaned_workspaces
description: monitor.py:287-289 uses subprocess.run(['ps', 'aux']) instead of psutil which is already imported and used elsewhere. Using psutil would be more consistent and portable.
close_reason: Replaced subprocess ps aux with psutil.process_iter

title: Add specific exception handling in log parsing functions
description: monitor.py log parsing functions use broad 'except Exception: pass' which could mask debugging issues. Consider catching specific exceptions (OSError, ValueError, etc.) or at least logging to debug.
close_reason: Replaced all broad Exception catches with specific exceptions
